thread.title: PCCTC to Broadcast 2015 Valparaiso vs. Merrillville Football Game Live on ValpoLife.com
thread.title_full: PCCTC to Broadcast 2015 Valparaiso vs. Merrillville Football Game Live on ValpoLife.com

title: PCCTC to Broadcast 2015 Valparaiso vs. Merrillville Football Game Live on ValpoLife.com
text:
Written by Porter County Career and Technical Center Last Updated on 02 October 2015 
The Porter County Career and Technical Center's Video Productions and Media Studies class will produce a live broadcast of the October 2nd Valparaiso Vikings vs. Merrillville Pirates football game, which can be steamed live on www.ValpoLife.com . 
The class' Payton Ball (Wheeler HS) will be doing play-by-play annnouncing for the broadcast alongside Alec Long (Hebron), who will provide color commentary. 
Be sure to tune in live at 7:00pm for the game!
